scripts.build:dev: jlpm install && jlpm run clean:packages && lerna link && jlpm run build:packages && jlpm run link:packages
scripts.clean: jlpm run uninstall:extensions && (lerna run --no-bail unlink || echo 'At least one unlink command failed, but continuing...') && jlpm clean:packages && jlpm clean:node
scripts.registry:init: npm adduser --registry http://localhost:4873 && npm publish packages/dataregistry-csvviewer --registry http://localhost:4873 && npm publish packages/dataregistry-registry --registry http://localhost:4873
